results.title: The Great Camel Race
results.creator_credit: Bill Leimbach, Richard Dennison, ABC-TV (Australia) and Orana Films
results.brief_description: The Great Camel Race, the longest animal endurance ever - from Alice Springs to the Gold Coast - is a rare example of the outback documentary that has a real story to tell. A story in which we can cheer the heroes and choose our villains!
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bill Leimbach, Richard Dennison, ABC-TV (Australia) and Orana Films

results.title: The Grasshopper: a typical insect
results.brief_description: One of the most common and widely known insects is the grasshopper. Its body structure is show as exemplifying the basic characteristics that identify insects and its life cycle is studied as typical of those insects who go through a process of incomplete metamorphosis. The need for controlling the grasshopper’s destructiveness is also shown.

results.title: The Good news is water
results.brief_description: Outlines the work of UNICEF in providing a permanent, clear water supply to a village in Imo State in Eastern Nigeria. The installation of such a water supply will combat cholera, diarrhoea and guinea worm contracted from using contaminated water holes.
results.description: Outlines the work of UNICEF in providing a permanent, clear water supply to a village in Imo State in Eastern Nigeria. The installation of such a water supply will combat cholera, diarrhoea and guinea worm contracted from using contaminated water holes.

results.title: The Good food show. series 2
results.brief_description: Gabrielle Gate takes us through a series of episodes which focus not only on good eating, but good health also. The emphasis is on freshness, quality and the excellence of Australian produce. Guest chefs appear on the programs to offer the viewers a range of delicious recipes and ideas. The programs on this tape are: Fishy tales; The Humble spud; Sweet temptations and Something special.

results.title: The Good Food Cookbook
results.brief_description: The Good Food Cookbook will not only show you how to master all those cooking techniques which recipes never seem to explain, but also give you hundreds of practical tips and hints so that you can both buy, prepare and cook food so much more easily and enjoyably. Rated: G
